question: Why would you want to live forever?

answers.gpt-4: It seems there may have been an error as there are no provided answers to the question, "Why would you want to live forever?" Please provide the answers to enable me to judiciously select the best response.
answers.llama-3.1-70b-versatile: To experience and learn as much as possible, to see the future unfold, to spend more time with loved ones, and to have the opportunity to make a lasting impact on the world.
answers.gemma2-9b-it: To experience all that life has to offer and continue learning and growing.
